name: Debug Log Parser
author: Patrick Hausmann

sections.description:
Debug Log Parser is a tool to parse your wordpress debug-file and manage your error-handling.

Debug Log Parser shows up the last errors summarized on the dashboard.

  • Define your own colour for different errors.
  • Control your error-handling
  • See the last errors summarized on the dashboard
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Please check, if the Debug Log Parser has right to write in wp-config.php
sections.faq:
After activating the plugin, my dashboard shows a blank site?

This means that Debug Log Parser needs to much memory, go to settings and set a lower memory limit.
